#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;


#define mod 1000000007
//#define DEBUG
#define inf 2147483647
#define ninf -2147483648
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define lls(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define ss(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define p(a) printf("%d",a)
#define llp(a) printf("%lld",a)
#define sp(a) printf("%s",a)
#define cp(a) printf("%c",a)
#define nline printf("\n")
#define space printf(" ")
#define fs(a) fscanf(fp,"%d",&a)
#define flls(a) fscanf(fp,"%lld",&a)
#define fss(a) fscanf(fp,"%s",a)
#define fp(a) fprintf(fo,"%d",a)
#define fllp(a) fprintf(fo,"%lld",a)
#define fsp(a) fprintf(fo,"%s",a)
#define fcp(a) fprintf(fo,"%c",a)
#define fnline fprintf(fo,"\n")
#define fspace fprintf(fo," ")
#define ll long long

map<int,int> m;
map<int,int>::iterator it;
int flag=0;

int dig(int n)
{
	int digi=0;
	while(n>0)
	{
		n=n/10;
		digi++;
	}
	return digi;
}

void compute(int n,int nd)
{
	//cout<<n<<"kkkk\n";
	//cout<<nd<<"yyy"<<endl;
	if(m[n]==1)
	{
		return ;}
	if(flag==0)
	{
		
	m.clear();
		flag=1;
	}
	else
	{
	//	cout<<n<<"kkkk\n";
		m[n]=1;
	}
	int lastdig,num,nummy,temp,tempnd,t;
	lastdig=n%10;
	//cout<<lastdig<<" cheecckk\n";
		num=(lastdig*pow(10,nd-1))+(n/10); //rr
	//cout<<num<<"llll\n";
	compute(num,dig(num));
	temp=n;

	tempnd=nd;
	nummy=0;
	t=1;
	while(tempnd>1) //lr
	{
		nummy=(temp%10)*t+nummy;
		temp=temp/10;
		t=t*10;
		tempnd--;
	}
	nummy=nummy*10+temp;
	//cout<<nummy<<"siddd\n";
	compute(nummy,dig(nummy));
}


int main()
{
#ifdef DEBUG
    cout<<"Debugging\n";
#endif
ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
FILE *fp,*fo;
fp=fopen("input.txt","r");
fo=fopen("output.txt","w");

int t,n,nd;
cin>>t;

while(t--)
{
	m.clear();
	flag=0;
	cin>>n;
	nd=dig(n);
	//cout<<nd<<"yyy\n";
	compute(n,nd);
	it=m.end();
	it--;	
	cout<<(*it).first<<endl;
	it=m.begin();
	while(it!=m.end())
	{
	//	cout<<(*it).first<<"tttt\n";
		it++;
	}
}
return 0;
}
